title: Contractor
bullets: Provided technical diagnostic and incident response services for small business clients
Identified WooCommerce Store API bot exploits and guided client through Cloudflare edge security implementation, resulting in zero fraudulent orders post-resolution
Conducted systematic root cause analysis resolving 503 production error through plugin isolation, PHP-level debugging, and WooCommerce query analysis

title: Cloud Consultant
bullets: Led design and implementation of serverless ETL pipeline architecture using AWS Step Functions, Amazon EventBridge, Amazon ECS Fargate, and Docker Containers
Engineered CI/CD automation framework using GitLab CI/CD and AWS CDK, resulting in 94% reduction in manual operations and standardized IaC practices
Architected and implemented enterprise data lake solution using AWS CDK with multi-stage (Bronze/Silver/Gold) data processing architecture
Established technical enablement artifacts reaching more than 4,400 AWS employees globally; conducted hands-on workshops and technical panels

title: Applications Developer
bullets: Led AWS infrastructure operations: RDS optimization, SQS monitoring, S3 security, CloudWatch alerting
Developed Java-based microservices and REST APIs integrated with MySQL; automated CI/CD and coding standards
Architected test automation framework using Selenium and JUnit, reducing regression testing time by 60%

title: Software Support Analyst
bullets: Collaborated with backend team implementing enterprise software using SQL Server, stored procedures, and query optimization
Led technical troubleshooting of client systems, resolving server-to-server and database connectivity issues while maintaining 24-hour SLA
Delivered on-site implementations, data migrations, and training for customer success teams
